abstract: Profile of Frances Tiafoe, 17-year-old tennis player who is widely considered next big American star; Tiafoe clinched wild card for French Open tennis tournament, which is set to begin on May 24.
lead_paragraph: Tiafoe has soared in the rankings since the beginning of the year, from 1,145th to 292nd, and has earned entry into his first main draw at a Grand Slam event, the French Open.

headline.main: Frances Tiafoe, a Rising U.S. Tennis Player, Shakes Things Up On and Off the Court
headline.print_headline: Torrid April Puts 17-Year-Old in an Unexpected Spot: The French Open

snippet: Tiafoe has soared in the rankings since the beginning of the year, from 1,145th to 292nd, and has earned entry into his first main draw at a Grand Slam event, the French Open.
